div.p: The official URL for this implementation guide is:
Implementation Guide German Oncological Data Standard (GOLD)

publisher.value: Berlin Institute of Health at Charité (BIH)

name.value: Berlin Institute of Health at Charité (BIH)

description.value: Implementation Guide German Oncological Data Standard (GOLD)

valueMarkdown.value: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology

description.value: Profile for body height of a patient
Profile for the base definition of all body structures.
Profile for body weight of a patient
This profile describes a clinical study in which a patient takes part.
Profile for the Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) Performance Status that represents a cancer patient's functional status.
Profile for the classification of a tumor's morphology(histology) and topography using ICD-O-3.
Profile for the description of a tumor's grade using the general four-tier grading scheme following the recommendations of the WHO classification of tumors and UICC.
Profile for the Karnofsky Performance Status to measure a cancer patient's ability to perform ordinary tasks.
Dieses Profil beschreibt eine Proband*in.

Profile for the RECIST timepoint assessment response which is available for each assessment timepoint as published here: https://recist.eortc.org/recist-1-1-2/ Please note there is no assessment timepoint response for the baseline assessment.
Profile for a tumor disorder
Tumor specimen
Profile for the tumor classification using TNM stage groups (I, II, III, or IV) and TNM staging elements (T, N, and M).

name.value: Profile UICC TNM Residual Tumor (R) Classification

description.value: Profile for the residual tumor (R) classification as part of TNM.
Profile for the base definition of all vital signs. May not be used directly. Only for reprofiling purposes.
Extension für die Erfassung der Diagnosesicherung der ICD-O-3
Enables to reference a diagnosis <Condition> the body stucture refers to
Enables to reference a Tumor <BodyStructure> from its respective Specimen
The Extension allows to add c, p and u prefixes to TNM stages.
The Extension allows to add isolated tumor cells (ITC) suffixes to the N- and M-categories in TNM.

name.value: Extension UICC TNM Suffix ITC SN

description.value: The Extension allows to add isolated tumor cells (ITC) sentinel lymph nodes (sn) suffix to the N-category in TNM.
ValueSet für die Diagnosesicherungscodes der ICD-O-3
Defines the valid values for the recist assessment response observation resource
The ValueSet contains the ECOG Performance Status values from SNOMED CT.
The ValueSet contains codes for the tumor grading system following the recommendations of the WHO Classification of Tumors from SNOMED CT.
The ValueSet contains the morphology (histology) codes from ICD-O-3.
The ValueSet contains the morphology (histology) codes from SNOMED CT.
Studiendesign aus NCI Thesaurus (NCIt)
Studienkategorien aus NCI Thesaurus (NCIt)
Study Focus aus NCI Thesaurus (NCIt)
This ValueSet contains codes to specifiy the type of TNM classification as clinical (cTNM) or pathological (pTNM).

name.value: ValueSet TNM L-Descriptor Lymphatic Invasion UICC

description.value: This ValueSet contains the TNM degree of lymphatic invasion codes used with the L-descriptor from TNM 8th edition UICC.
This ValueSet contains the TNM M category codes from TNM 8th edition UICC.

name.value: ValueSet TNM M Staging Type LOINC

description.value: This ValueSet contains codes to specifiy the TNM distant metastases (M) category as clinical (cM) or pathological (pM).
This ValueSet contains the TNM N category codes from TNM 8th edition UICC.

name.value: ValueSet TNM N Staging Type LOINC

description.value: This ValueSet contains codes to specifiy the TNM regional lymph nodes (N) category as clinical (cN) or pathological (pN).

name.value: ValueSet TNM Pn-Descriptor Perineural Invasion UICC

description.value: This ValueSet contains the TNM degree of perineural (lymphatic nerve sheet) invasion codes used with the Pn-descriptor from TNM 8th edition UICC.
This ValueSet contains the c, p and u prefixes for TNM stages from TNM 8th edition UICC.

name.value: ValueSet TNM Residual Tumor (R) Classification UICC

description.value: This ValueSet contains the TNM residual tumor (R) classification codes from TNM 8th edition UICC.

name.value: ValueSet TNM S Serum Tumour Markers UICC

description.value: This ValueSet contains the TNM serum levels of tumor markers coded for germ cell tumors used with the S-symbol from TNM 8th edition UICC.
The ValueSet contains codes for the TNM stage groups ranging from I to IV to group cancer patients with similar prognosis from TNM 8th edition UICC.

name.value: ValueSet TNM Suffix ITC SN UICC

description.value: This ValueSet contains the isolated tumor cells (ITC) sentinel lymph nodes (sn) suffix for the N-category in TNM from TNM 8th edition UICC.
This ValueSet contains the isolated tumor cells (ITC) suffixes for N- and M-category from TNM 8th edition UICC.
This ValueSet contains the TNM T category codes from TNM 8th edition UICC.
This ValueSet contains the TNM primary tumor multiplicity codes used with the m-symbol from TNM 8th edition UICC.

name.value: ValueSet TNM T Staging Type LOINC

description.value: This ValueSet contains codes to specifiy the TNM primary tumor (T) category as clinical (cT) or pathological (pT).

name.value: ValueSet TNM V-Descriptor Venous Invasion UICC

description.value: This ValueSet contains the TNM degree of venous invasion codes used with the V-descriptor from TNM 8th edition UICC.
The ValueSet contains the topography codes from ICD-O-3.
The ValueSet contains the topography codes from SNOMED CT.
Type of Blinding aus NCI Thesaurus (NCIt)
Type of Randomization aus NCI Thesaurus (NCIt)

name.value: ValueSet Type of Study Arm NCIt

description.value: Type of Study Arm aus NCI Thesaurus (NCIt)
